#summary List of query parameters that work across all queries

  * apikey: Required. Your API key.
  * pretty: Optional. Prettify JSON results (easier to read). Format: set to '1' if you want prettified results.
  * jsoncallback: Optional. Return response in [http://bob.pythonmac.org/archives/2005/12/05/remote-json-jsonp/ JSONP] format. Also, check out JQuery has nice [http://docs.jquery.com/Ajax/jQuery.getJSON support for JSONP callbacks]. Format: set to '1' if you want a response in JSONP format.
